title: Understand help me array in assembly? [duplicate]
content:

answers_data.content: The explanation is given in the book immediately following the listing (Practical Malware Analysis Chapter 6 page 128 "Recognizing C Code Constructs in Assembly"):

Ah, exact same question than index of array in assembly?. Possible duplicate...
